solution_line_template: Olga has half as many blue fish as yellow ones, which means {yellow_fish} * {blue_ratio} = <<{yellow_fish}*{blue_ratio}={blue_fish}>>{blue_fish} blue fish.
Green fish are twice as many as yellow ones, so in total there are {yellow_fish} * {green_ratio} = <<{yellow_fish}*{green_ratio}={green_fish}>>{green_fish} green fish.
So all the fish sum up to {yellow_fish} + {blue_fish} + {green_fish} = <<{yellow_fish}+{blue_fish}+{green_fish}={total_fish}>>{total_fish}.
